arts.ttl: Serie A | Cremonese 1-1 Atalanta: Vardy not enough to down La Dea
arts.sum: Jamie Vardy scored his first Cremonese goal and celebrated with backflips, but Atalanta still got...

arts.ttl: Cremonese vs. Atalanta: a Lombard derby
arts.sum: Cremonese are unbeaten at home in 11 official matches across last season and this: four Grigiorossi wins and seven draws. Atalanta, one point ahead of their next opponents and the only unbeaten side left in Serie A, have drawn their last three matches and are aiming to secure a victory to keep in touch with the leaders.

arts.ttl: Cremonese vs Atalanta - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Serie A clash between Cremonese and Atalanta BC, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
